item.description:
The agenda for this meeting involves ordering Mexican beers, domestic beer, and/or a variety of delicious margaritas slung at one of Waltham's favorite places.

Also, I highly recommend the Russelrita - it's fabulous :) I hope to see all of you there! Bring your friends and your coworkers - the more the merrier!

Please call Jill at 617.458.1221 and let her know that you will be joining us. She'll save a seat for you!
item.why: It's Cinco de Mayo, sillies! It's a Monday. Susan and I will be there. Booze will be there. Chips and salsa will be there. Case closed!
item.name: Cinco de Mayo
